Summary: they are out before the stars. they just hover, one will flash/blink mostly red, other mostly blue/green, the other white, other just seem to blink all of them. they are there every night. i have counted standing in one spot 12. but there are so many more
divs: sighting detailsevery night for months i have observed objects in the night sky blinking lights of red, white, blue\green. they are hovering every night.standing in one spot i have counted 12.but there are many more. i have googled asking the question," does anyone know what they are"? i went to the nasa site, there were more people asking the same question, from oregon, canada, california and many more.sometimes they will be one that has moved to another area, but i haven't seen them move. these objects are out before the stars.. i also have noticed they are all located in the constellations it seems at least one in each. they seem to superimpose themselves to make it look like they are part of that star system. but they are much closer. a few times they have been close enough that i could see each individual light. they seemed to be just above tree top level. one of the objects will blink mostly red, one mostly blue\green and one white. the others seem to have all their lights pulsating. i thought it was the military. but i didn't know they had the capability and money to do something like this, especially some type of plane that can hover for hours every night 7 days a week. i read from the nasa site that people have been seening these objests several months before i noticed them. i go out every night it is clear and observe them. they are easy to spot after you get observing them nightly, but at first they look like a star. if anyone knows what they are. please share with the rest of us. you know where i am every night observing the hovering @ blinking sincerely, star gazer
